About Me

(Introduction)

I am a freelance web developer based in Bowie, MD.
I specialize in developing small & large projects for individuals & small business clients.


Most of my projects are primarily focused on the front-end, however, I also have developed projects that are mainly focused on the back-end.

BIO

I did not always code, but I developed an interest turned into passion for building web applications starting in 2018. In additon to being self-taught, I attended General Assembly (Washington D.C.), where I was enrolled full-time, in a fully immersive, 12 week course.

This course gave me a diverse set of skills, ranging from computer programming, web development, user experience design, all the way to data science, & product management.

General Assembly

Full-Stack Developer (2018)

I attended General Assembly (Washington D.C.), and enrolled in the fully immersive, Full-Stack Web Development Boot Camp Course
from October 2018 - February 2019.

Skills

Software

(Front-End): HTML5, CSS3, SASS, React.js, Tailwind-CSS, & Bootstrap.

(Full-Stack): Ruby, Javascript, Express.js, & Firebase



(Other skils): JSON, Object Oriented Programming using (ES6-ES8 classes), JQuery, Node.js, UI Design, Git, Animation, MVC Architecture, Gulp, Content Management Systems.
